div.ab: zōt ud rāspīg: vid. VVrS27.19. Cf. VrS27.19. Cf. also zōt ud rāspīg Y24.12.

Parallels.ab: VytVrS27.19 ≈ VytVrS1.3, VytVrS2.3, VytVrS3.5, VytVrS4.8, VytVrS6.2, VytVrS7.6, VytVrS14.6, VytVrS17.2, VytVrS25.5, VytVrS77.2, VytVrS78.15, VytVrS79.8, VytVrS81.2, VytVrS82.3, VytVrS90.3

Nerangs.ab: āat̰ dīš āuuaēδaiiamahi pad ēn gyāg taštag kē-š hōm ud urwarām pad datuš nihišn pad urwēs bē nihišn hāwan az kustag ī hōy ō kustag ī dašn āwarišn pad rōy pad kunišn haδa.mąθrāi zaini.parštāi upairi.gātubiiō gərəptāi mąθrāi spəṇtāi aṣ̌aōne aṣ̌ahe raθβe yasnāica vaɱāica xšnaōθrāica frasastaiiaēca

"āat̰ dīš āuuaēδaiiamahi. At this passage, he has to put again in contact with the datuš the saucer that contains the hōm ud urwarām and (then) to put it on the urwēs; he has to bring the hāwan from the left side to the right side and put it upside-down (and continue with) haδa.mąθrāi zaini.parštāi upairi.gātubiiō gərəptāi mąθrāi spəṇtāi aṣ̌aōne aṣ̌ahe raθβe yasnāica vaɱāica xšnaōθrāica frasastaiiaēca."
